title: Molly Devine and Timeless Records
author: Keith Paterson
summary: An introduction to Molly Devine on Timeless Records as the first artist to join the label.

title: Introducing Maddy: A Voice Like Velvet, a Spirit Like Fire
author: Keith Paterson
summary: Get to know Maddy, the powerhouse behind Timeless Records' first major single release. We explore her influences, her process, and the story behind the song.
